text: Katie Louise McGlynn (born 16 July 1993 in Rochdale, Greater Manchester) is an English actress. She is best known for portraying the roles of Jodie "Scout" Allen in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2011–2013) and Sinead Tinker in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street (2013–2020). Then from 2021 to 2022, she appeared as Becky Quentin in the Channel 4 soap opera Hollyoaks. ==Other websites== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Rochdale Category:Actors from Greater Manchester
title: Katie McGlynn
